entry.title:
[WW] How do those of you in the private sector estimate your salary and value?
I'm
entry.content:
How do those of you in the private sector estimate your salary and value?
I'm job hunting again and a lot of job applications are asking for a salary range. In the military my salary was almost entirely up to the whims of Congress so I never really thought about it that much. I have a pretty precise budget so I know the minimum I can live on, but I'm having trouble figuring out how high to go on top of that. On the one hand, I don't want to price myself out of a job but on the other hand I don't want to lowball myself and get taken for a ride. Suggestions?
